fixedPrice.title: FIXED PRICE GUARANTEE
fixedPrice.description: Begin your trip, whether for leisure or business, with peace of mind. With our fixed rates, there’s no need to worry about extra fees or hidden costs. Both our airport transfers and our pricing are clear and dependable.

cancelFree.title: CANCEL FOR FREE
cancelFree.description: Plans changed? No problem! At FH Airport Transfer, we offer a flexible cancellation policy with no booking or credit card fees, as long as you cancel at least 4 hours before your scheduled journey.

ourServices.title: OUR SERVICES
ourServices.description: Alongside our airport transfer and shuttle services in Frankfurt, we offer a variety of other options to enhance your travel experience. Sit back and enjoy the ride while we handle all the details. Explore our range of services to ensure a smooth and enjoyable journey.

reliableTransfers.title: RELIABLE TRANSFERS
reliableTransfers.description: Our airport transfer service in Frankfurt is something you can trust! We offer stress-free, timely, and secure transportation to Frankfurt Airport or any other destination. Our long-standing experience reflects our commitment to quality.

doorToDoor.title: DOOR-TO-DOOR SERVICE
doorToDoor.description: Our drivers provide punctual pickup at Frankfurt Airport and take you straight to your destination’s doorstep. We’re also available to pick you up from your home and drive you to the airport on time—more convenient, efficient, and cost-effective than a taxi.

meetAndGreet.title: MEET & GREET SERVICE
meetAndGreet.description: Even if your flight is delayed, your driver will be waiting for you with a name sign after baggage claim. No need to search or wait—just continue your journey seamlessly.

services.heading: Our Services
services.subtitle: Looking for Reliable Transportation to and from Frankfurt Airport?
services.description: We provide Dependable and timely airport transportation service in Frankfurt
services.list1_item1: Door-to-door airport transfer service in Frankfurt, ensuring timely and safe arrival for your flight.
services.list1_item2: Pick-up from Frankfurt Airport with a name sign, providing stress-free recognition and efficient service.
services.list1_item3: Available for travel anywhere in Germany or Europe, including nearby cities like Mainz, Heidelberg, and any other German airport.
services.list1_item4: Extended services for event transfers, city tours, trade fairs, and other destinations across Europe.
services.list1_item5: 24/7 availability to accommodate plan changes and last-minute schedules.

completed.message: Congratulations! Your ride is being booked. You will receive a confirmation call shortly!

carSelection.error: Bitte wählen Sie ein Auto aus
